ingredients.ingredient: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup

cookingTips: Cut chicken into small pieces for even cooking throughout the casserole
Mix all ingredients before baking to ensure even distribution
Cover casserole for the first 30 minutes to allow rice to absorb liquid, then uncover for browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook prepare a simple all-in-one casserole where rice cooks perfectly in the creamy chicken mixture.
